Norev Audi DE Audi 200 Quattro 1987 Safari Rally Winner H. Mikkola/A. Hertz

Purchased: 2010

18th (& final) WRC win for Hannu Mikkola.
24th (& final) WRC win for Audu.
Only WRC win for 200 Quattro.

Hannu Mikkola famously won the event for Audi with the Group A 200 Quattro after an absorbing battle with the Toyota Supra 3.0i of Björn Waldegård, who eventually retired with engine trouble. Audi's victory on that year's Safari marked the first time that a four-wheel drive car won the event outright and it would also be the German manufacturer's last WRC win.
